info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 22 at 12:57PM CDT until August 22 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following county, Harris.
* WHEN...Until 400 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1257 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northern Missouri City, Bellaire, West University Place, Jersey Village, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Branch West, Spring Branch North, eastern Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Valley, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, southwestern Memorial Park, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, University Place, Astrodome Area, Hedwig Village, Southside Place and Hilshire Village. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON
